explanation: [0-0] On a countertop, a pair of hands reach into a bowl filled with soapy water.

[0-3] The hands take out many bottle caps from the soapy water. The scene then switches to a wooden chopping board, where a hand places the cleaned metal bottle caps one by one. Then, a piece of dough is taken out and placed on top of the bottle caps. A rolling pin appears and rolls over the dough from top to bottom.

[0-3] The hands take out many bottle caps from the soapy water. The scene then switches to a wooden chopping board, where a hand places the cleaned metal bottle caps one by one. Then, a piece of dough is taken out and placed on top of the bottle caps. A rolling pin appears and rolls over the dough from top to bottom.

[0-3] The hands take out many bottle caps from the soapy water. The scene then switches to a wooden chopping board, where a hand places the cleaned metal bottle caps one by one. Then, a piece of dough is taken out and placed on top of the bottle caps. A rolling pin appears and rolls over the dough from top to bottom.

[3-11] The rolling pin is then removed, leaving a clear bottle cap-shaped imprint on the dough. Then, a piping bag is taken out, and red sauce is squeezed onto the dough, with a dollop of sauce in each bottle cap imprint. Subsequently, another piece of dough is placed on top, rolled over once with a rolling pin, and the prepared bottle cap-shaped dough is removed from the bottle cap using a toothpick.
